summary: Diff adds a SafeImage component and updates App.tsx to use a new generated brand icon path. It also claims index.html favicon updates and broader styling/theme changes, but the diff summary does not provide evidence that the new icon files were actually added, that all broken images were fixed end-to-end, or that the redeploy/canister-resolution issue was addressed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate new brand icon assets from download-2.webp and reference them consistently (favicon + apple-touch-icon in frontend/index.html under /assets/generated/; header/footer logo in App.tsx uses generated square icon).
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx references /assets/generated/bmc-icon.dim_512x512.png, but the diff summary does not show the actual generated image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and the App.tsx snippet only shows the header logo (no evidence for footer logo update). index.html changes are only described in a secondary summary file, not shown as direct diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix invisible/broken images: ensure all referenced assets exist in deployed build, use URL-safe paths, and degrade gracefully if optional images are missing (no broken thumbnails).
missing_requirements.reason: SafeImage provides graceful degradation, but the diff summary does not show concrete updates to the hero background and service-section gallery image paths or confirmation that all referenced assets exist and are URL-safe. App.tsx where those images live is truncated and the actual image path changes are not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Rebuild/redeploy so the public link resolves (no “Canister ID Not Resolved”) and latest assets (including new icons) are served.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment/rebuild configuration, canister configuration, or hosting changes are shown. The diff contains only frontend code and summary metadata; nothing evidences addressing canister ID resolution or redeployment steps.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new SafeImage component with placeholder UI text ('Image unavailable') and loading/error handling.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested as a standalone feature; REQ-13 asks for graceful degradation, but the specific component implementation and placeholder UI are additional behavior beyond the stated acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed/added a new global design theme (warm industrial OKLCH palette) and Tailwind config adjustments (Inter font, custom design tokens).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-12/13/14; the BuildRequest is focused on icons, broken images, and redeploy/canister resolution, and also lists constraints/non-goals rather than a redesign request.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated HTML page title for SEO.
